short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable visual bookmark manager for your new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabTrove is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension that transforms your new tab page into a personalized bookmark manager. With TabTrove, you can easily organize, access, and manage your favorite websites in a visually appealing grid layout.
Key Features:

Customizable bookmark tiles with website favicons
Quick add, edit, and delete functionality for bookmarks
Responsive design that adapts to different screen sizes
Customizable background and color settings
Clean and intuitive user interface

TabTrove helps you streamline your browsing experience by providing instant access to your most important websites. Whether you're a student, professional, or casual internet user, TabTrove will help you stay organized and boost your productivity.
Get started with TabTrove today and take control of your browser tabs!
